author: Michael Larabel
description: The Budgie 10.10 desktop has been officially released in marking the open-source project's transition from X11 to Wayland...
title: Budgie 10.10 Released: Officially Migrated From X11 To Wayland

author: Michael Larabel
description: The ollama 0.14-rc2 release is available today and it introduces new functionality with ollama run --experimental for in this experimental mode to run an agent loop so that LLMs can use tools like bash and web searching on your system. It's opt-in for letting ollama/LLMs make use of bash on your local system and there are at least some safeguards in place...
title: ollama 0.14 Can Make Use Of Bash For Letting AI/LLMs Run Commands On Your System

author: Michael Larabel
description: With new volunteers stepping up for This Week in Plasma, there is a new issue out this week to highlight more development activities going into the upcoming KDE Plasma 6.6 desktop release...
title: KDE Plasma 6.6 Adds oo7 Secret Service Provider Support, Save As New Global Theme

author: Michael Larabel
description: The current incarnation of ZLUDA continues moving along for running unmodified CUDA apps on non-NVIDIA GPUs. Released on Friday was ZLUDA 6-preview.48 with now boasting CUDA 13.1 compatibility...
title: ZLUDA Adds CUDA 13.1 Compatibility For Running CUDA Apps On Non-NVIDIA Hardware
